Name: One Night With Stalin
About the game: One Night With Stalin is an indie horror game in which you have to explore an abandoned Soviet city in order to find 15 pictures depicting anime girls. But be careful, you are not the only one who wanders between these dilapidated housesâ€¦ Act stealthily, hide in bushes and buildings, or find weapons to fight back against enemies! The gameplay is simple. In the menu, you can choose one of three levels and the time of day at this level. When the game starts, you will appear on a location filled with awesome enemies, find weapons to defend against them. To complete the game, you need to collect 15 pictures that are scattered here. Features Authentic Soviet life Communist screamers Collect pictures with cute girls ;) Stalin is trying to devour you
